successEndConditions.condition: Game instructions are successfully edited and executed

mainSequence.step: User opens the game and loads the map and robot position
Game Controller initializes the game state
Game Interface displays the initial map and robot position
User clicks on the edit instructions button
Game Interface enters the instruction editing interface
User selects an instruction
Game Interface adds the selected instruction
User continues selecting and adding instructions
Game Interface requests to continue selecting and adding instructions as User selects
User selects and adds more instructions
Game Interface allows continuing selection and addition of instructions
Game Interface completes the instruction editing
User clicks the start button
Game Interface starts the game
Game Logic begins executing the instruction sequence
Game Controller updates the game status based on instruction execution
User decides to exit the game
Game Interface handles the game exit request
Game Logic manages the game exit
Game Interface confirms successful game exit to the User
